name: Call of The Sky Lyric Book
name_original: Call of The Sky Lyric Book
description:
If you didn't buy Skyjacks: Call of the Sky or you stuck with the standard edition, this digital lyric book will be the perfect companion to the songs from Campaign Skyjacks. It also contains information about The Windworn, the traveling musicians of Spéir, written by James D'Amato. As if all that wasn't enough it is full of gorgeous illustration work by Justin Lanjil and layout by Jason Robinson.

 laid out by Jason Robinson and illustrated by Justin Lanjil. The Lyric book contains entries for: 

  • Skyjacks
  • Bound for the Cutting Stone
  • Lighthouse
  • Way Hay Ho
  • Toast The Axel
  • Ring The Bell
  • Call of the Sky
  • Johnny Forgot His Square Knot
  • Call of the Sky (Fan Edition)
  • Otto Van Von Veen

This contains files for a 12"x12" formatted digital book and a 8.5"x11" print at-home version.

IF YOU PURCHASED THE CAPTAIN'S EDITION OF "CALL OF THE SKY," YOU ALREADY HAVE THIS.
